title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one visual element of Chairman Mao en route to Anyuan.
Response accurately describes one visual element of Chairman Mao en route to Anyuan.
Response accurately describes two visual elements of Chairman Mao en route to Anyuan.

title: Task 2: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use an example of specific visual OR contextual evidence to explain how the work departs from traditional Chinese painting through the use of Western painting conventions.
Response uses one example of specific visual OR contextual evidence to explain how the work departs from traditional Chinese painting through the use of Western painting conventions.
Response uses two examples of specific visual OR contextual evidence to explain how the work departs from traditional Chinese painting through the use of Western painting conventions.

title: Task 3: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or a group of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific contextual evidence to explain how the work was influenced by the political or cultural context of China in the second half of the twentieth century.
Response does accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain how the work was influenced by the political or cultural context of China in the second half of the twentieth century.
